attributes.action: Withdraw the 'Right to Strike' from all Trade Unions
attributes.additional_details:
Private sector workers who work long hours, have basic employment contracts and little job security accept that their respective job or career is their own  choice.
So why should the public sector whose packages are highly competitive, if not better than the private sector have the 'Right to Strike', causing loss of income for hard working individuals, families and businesses across the UK?

The result = The public sector get better contracts and pay rises / The private sector and the people of Britain lose out

NOT FAIR
